Player is now rank 1! Player is now rank 2! Player is now rank 3! Player is now rank 4! Player is now rank 5! Player is now rank 6! Player is now rank 1! Player is now rank 2! Player is now rank 3! Player is now rank 4! Player is now rank 5! Player is now rank 6! Player is now rank 1! Player is now rank 2! Player is now rank 3! Player is now rank 4! Player is now rank 5! Player is now rank 6! item.title: [317/Delta] Probably a Simple Fix? Help?
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

Ok so I just added a ranking system based off total exp… Whenever i compile it says I have reached all six ranks over and over again really fast and gives me max cash… How do I fix it so it only gives me the one rank based off my total exp and rewards me once?

This was added under “public boolean process()”

if (rank != 1 || totalXP >= 0 || totalXP <= 149999999) { rank = 1; } else { return false; } if (rank != 2 || totalXP >= 150000000 || totalXP <= 299999999) { rank = 2; yell(""+ playerName +" is now Rank 2!"); sM("For reaching Rank 2, You are rewarded 20mil"); addItem(995, 20000000); } else { return false; } if (rank != 3 || totalXP >= 300000000 || totalXP <= 449999999) { rank = 3; yell(""+ playerName +" is now Rank 3!"); sM("For reaching Rank 3, You are rewarded 40mil"); addItem(995, 40000000); } else { return false; } if (rank != 4 || totalXP >= 450000000 || totalXP <= 599999999) { rank = 4; yell(""+ playerName +" is now Rank 4!"); sM("For reaching Rank 4, You are rewarded 75mil"); addItem(995, 75000000); } else { return false; } if (rank != 5 || totalXP >= 600000000 || totalXP <= 749999999) { rank = 5; yell(""+ playerName +" is now Rank 5!"); sM("For reaching Rank 5, You are rewarded 100mil"); addItem(995, 100000000); } else { return false; } if (rank != 6 || totalXP >= 750000000) { rank = 6; yell(""+ playerName +" is now Highest Rank!"); sM("For reaching Rank 6, You are rewarded 200mil"); addItem(995, 200000000); } else { return false; }

Read full topic
